title: Client bugged
body:
Hey,

I have played league now for about 1 year and have never had any problems. But now I get a message that pops up every time again when I start up my client saying: "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch you up to the latest version." but it doesn't patch. So I click on OK and I get a next pop-up that tells me this: "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating after you restart the patcher." So I restart the patcher and this whole thing starts again. I have tried to look on the forum for a solution but they didn't work, re√Ønstalling my game also didn't work. I just want to play league but I can't because of this stupid bugg. So I ask for a solution.

Thanks for reading and thinking of a solution with me :D

LennertPanda

replies.body: I'd be pretty frustrating constantly getting that error, even after a reinstall.  This could be happening for a few reasons, the most prominent being a possible security setting that's blocking your game files from being accessed or updated properly.  Start off with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is being added as an exception without security blocks.  Let me know if if progress is made!

First I will thank you for replying to my post :D
Second I need to say that I have followed the steps of the permissions guide (except for the reinstalling because I already did that) but that I still get the error. I don't know what is causing the error but I'm even thinking of resetting my whole PC to get this fixed, do you think that's a good idea or do you have another solution?

Happy to help!  I don't think an OS reset would do a whole lot other than take up more of your time, and there could be other factors involved.  In this case, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs.  You can also use it to auto-configure your firewall settings just in case.

Attach those logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will help out with this and find a fix.  We'll see you there!

Thanks again I will try to do this!
(I do feel that you helped a bit because I can logg in faster but that can also be a feeling xD)
I do want to say that sometimes I get lucky and I don't get the second message but than I have tried it for 15 minutes or longer so that's just really annoying.
